Rider¶

Provides a framework to load and store data on riders.

class first_cycling_api.rider.Rider(rider_id)¶

A wrapper class to load and store information on riders.

ID¶

The firstycling.com ID for the rider (can be found in the URL for their profile page).

Type

int

header_details¶

A dictionary listing information from the header of rider profile pages.

Type

dict

sidebar_details¶

A series listing information from the right sidebar of rider profile pages.

Type

pd.Series

years_active¶

A list of the years in which the rider was active.

Type

list of int

results¶

The rider’s results for each year.

Type

dict {int: RiderYearResults}

race_history¶

The rider’s history at the race with the given ID.

Type

dict {int: RiderRaceHistory}

get_best_results()¶

Get the rider’s best results.

Returns

Return type

RiderBestResults

get_monument_results()¶

Get the rider’s results in monuments.

Returns

Return type

RiderMonumentResults

get_one_day_races()¶

Get the rider’s results at major one-day races.

Returns

Return type

RiderOneDayRaces

get_race_history(race_id)¶

Get the rider’s history at a certain race.

Parameters

race_id (int) – The firstcycling.com ID for the desired race, from the race profile URL.

Returns

Return type

RiderRaceHistory

get_stage_races()¶

Get the rider’s results at major stage races.

Returns

Return type

RiderStageRaces

get_team_and_ranking()¶

Get the rider’s historical teams and rankings.

Returns

Return type

RiderTeamAndRanking

get_teams()¶

Get the rider’s historical teams.

Returns

Return type

RiderTeams

get_uci_victories()¶

Get the rider’s UCI victories.

Returns

Return type

RiderVictories

get_victories()¶

Get the rider’s victories.

Returns

Return type

RiderVictories

get_year(year=None)¶

Get rider details and results for given year.

Parameters

year (int) – Year for which to collect information. If None, collects information for latest unloaded year in which rider was active, or if all years already loaded returns latest year.

Returns

Return type

RiderYearResults

get_years(years=None)¶

Get rider details and results for given years.

Parameters

years (list of int) – List of years for which to collect information. If None, collects information for all years in which rider was active.

Returns

results – Results for selected years.

Return type

dict {int: RiderYearResults}
